00002   "unionImage.pl",

00005 
00006 $bHTML = '\begin{rawhtml}';
00007 $eHTML = '\end{rawhtml}';
00008 
00009 #  HTML(htmlcode)
00010 #  HTML(htmlcode,texcode)
00011 #
00012 #  Insert $html in HTML mode or \begin{rawhtml}$html\end{rawhtml} in
00013 #  Latex2HTML mode.  In TeX mode, insert nothing for the first form, and
00014 #  $tex for the second form.
00015 #
00016 sub HTML {
00017   my ($html,$tex) = @_;
00018   return('') unless (defined($html) && $html ne '');
00019   $tex = '' unless (defined($tex));
00020   MODES(TeX => $tex, Latex2HTML => $bHTML.$html.$eHTML, HTML => $html);
00021 }
00022 
00023 #
00024 #  Begin and end <TT> mode
00025 #
00026 $BTT = HTML('<TT>','\texttt{');
00027 $ETT = HTML('</TT>','}');
00028 
00029 #
00030 #  Begin and end <SMALL> mode
00031 #
00032 $BSMALL = HTML('<SMALL>','{\small ');
00033 $ESMALL = HTML('</SMALL>','}');
00034 
00035 #
00036 #  Block quotes
00037 #
00038 $BBLOCKQUOTE = HTML('<BLOCKQUOTE>','\hskip3em ');
00039 $EBLOCKQUOTE = HTML('</BLOCKQUOTE>');
00040 
00041 #
00042 #  Smart-quotes in TeX mode, regular quotes in HTML mode
00043 #
00044 $LQ = MODES(TeX => '``', Latex2HTML => '"', HTML => '"');
00045 $RQ = MODES(TeX => "''", Latex2HTML => '"', HTML => '"');
00046 
00047 #
00048 #  make sure all characters are displayed
00049 #
00050 sub protectHTML {
00051     my $string = shift;
00052     $string =~ s/&/\&amp;/g;
00053     $string =~ s/</\&lt;/g;
00054     $string =~ s/>/\&gt;/g;
00055     $string;
00056 }
00057 
00058 sub _parserUtils_init {}
00059 
00060 1;
